column1: Little Goat Diner////My husband and I dined here during a weekend away to celebrate our anniversary and my birthday. We couldn't get into Girl and the Goat
column2: so we were happy to secure reservations at the next best thing. It was loud
column4: it was great! It is not romantic or quiet. The food is heavy
column5: although I was pleased with the Goat'o Goat'o salad. We had a blast
column6: but I do think it's better suited for lunch or brunch. Great location
